transcription.text: Hi, I am Siddharth. You are my banking assistant. Can you please help me by telling my account
details and also I would like to know about my account balance, my past transactions and
few other details of my account? Like is there any loan account associated with my customer
ID or any fixed deposit and also tell me about the loan rates that your bank has to offer
me. Can you do this pretty thing for me?
